channel.title: Client banner and name (317)
channel.description:
okay i downloaded a 317 server and im working on it atm but i cant seem to find where the banner is. The banner im talking about is the banner when you client is finished loading and you are about to log in. Around the log in box i cant find it in the files anyone know where i can find it at or change it at.
secondly i want the change the client name at the very top where it has the tab with the exit, minimize and ect and the banner name is on the right(toprightcorner) how do i change that also.
and third i just saw this in the log in box i need to change that also where it says
Welcome to --------- Please enter your password and user name
i need to edit the ------ after the welcome to
thanks for reading

item.title: Client banner and name (317)
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

umm i cant get on my server any more i did last night this my first time making a server how do i run the server i got the client and evrything

and on the banner i looked the only thing i could find was login box and it was blank that was the closest think i could find to the banner and stuff its just black.

Read full topic

item.title: Client banner and name (317)
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Oh, it’s the background image of your client. Look for it in your “Sprites/” folder, it should be a .png, via.‘background.png’ Then right click>Edit

For the top right thing, look in JFrame.java, i’d just remove it and remove “Jframe” from your run.bat

Read full topic

the black with the banner is what were talking about i also need to change the top right hand corner part

@Muroth wrote:

The background of the client? Please post an image of what you’re talking about, you lost me…

item.title: Client banner and name (317)
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:2, topic:344113”]Go into your client class and search for

Welcome to

and you should see the text in quotes (“Welcome to NAMEOFCLIENT”)

Oh and could you explain more about this ‘banner’ pleasE?[/quote]

ty and the banner okay when you go to play the client you click the client it loads and everything and it ask for ur pass and username to log in.hmk? well the box is the box that you put ur pass and and username on the outside of the box it has a banner/logo.

Read full topic
